column4: does anybody know if samba will still properly share ext4 partitions with windows?
Ext4 and Windows  I think is basically a no
not sure about samba though, but for  Windows  Ext4  reading and writing drivers, yeah Ext4 is a no
i understand that there is no driver for ext4 in windows.  but i'm sharing my ext3 partitions through samba with windows now and they're accessing just fine
